subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Syracuse, a perennial loser, went from 9-20 and 3-13 in the conference in his rookie season to 22-9 and 10-6 in the conference in 2007-8, winning a team-record 12 games in a row.
snippet: Syracuse, a perennial loser, went from 9-20 and 3-13 in the conference in his rookie season to 22-9 and 10-6 in the conference in 2007-8, winning a team-record 12 games in a row.
